availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Chapeze (Ohio County, Kentucky, attorney and Commonwealth's Attorney for the 3rd Judicial District of Kentucky)

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, attorney. Bardstown, Kentucky, native. Married to Rachel Anna Grider Chapeze. Father of Elizabeth Chapeze. Attorney in Muhlenberg County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Ohio County in 1860. Commonwealth's attorney for the 3rd Judicial District of the Commonwealth of Kentucky in Ohio County from 1862 to 1866.
